data.Title: Google Search Updates
data.Description: Google has been busy with several updates to its search engine, including testing auto-playing video thumbnails in search results, confirming that ads can show up below organic featured snippets, and making more use of the right sidebar on desktop and overlays on mobile.

data.Title: Bing Search Tests Voting Feature
data.Description: Bing is testing a new feature that allows users to vote on search results, with the voting distribution displayed.

data.Title: Google Search Console Updates
data.Description: Google Search Console has rolled out new settings for businesses to provide shipping and return policy information, while also removing Thumbtack booking and appointment links from business profiles.

data.Title: OpenAI Developments
data.Description: OpenAI is reportedly developing a search product and working on a project codenamed "Strawberry" to enhance AI model reasoning capabilities.

data.Title: COPIED Act Targets AI Content Use
data.Description: The COPIED Act, a new Senate bill, seeks to protect artists and journalists' content from unauthorized AI use by establishing content ownership and integrity standards.

data.Title: Majestic to Discontinue Disavow Links Feature
data.Description: Majestic announced the discontinuation of its disavow links feature, citing its ineffectiveness in identifying toxic links.

data.Title: Amazon Launches AI Shopping Assistant Rufus
data.Description: Amazon's AI-powered shopping assistant, Rufus, is now available to all US customers through the Amazon mobile app.

data.Title: 3D/AR Objects Expand in Google Search Results
data.Description: Google is expanding the availability of 3D/AR objects in search results to more retailers.

data.Title: Samsung Revamps Bixby with AI Focus
data.Description: Samsung is giving its Bixby voice assistant an AI-powered makeover to enhance its competitiveness with Google Assistant and Apple's Siri.

data.Title: The Rise of Forums in SEO
data.Description: Discussion boards are regaining popularity, with Google now prioritizing them in search results. Learn how to leverage forums for community building and engagement on your website.
